## Scene.getDebugInfo() method

获取场景的调试信息

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDebugInfo(): {
        name: string;
        entityCount: number;
        processorCount: number;
        isRunning: boolean;
        entities: Array<{
            name: string;
            id: number;
            componentCount: number;
            componentTypes: string[];
        }>;
        processors: Array<{
            name: string;
            updateOrder: number;
            entityCount: number;
        }>;
        componentStats: Map<string, any>;
    };
```
**Returns:**

{ name: string; entityCount: number; processorCount: number; isRunning: boolean; entities: Array&lt;{ name: string; id: number; componentCount: number; componentTypes: string\[\]; }&gt;; processors: Array&lt;{ name: string; updateOrder: number; entityCount: number; }&gt;; componentStats: Map&lt;string, any&gt;; }
